title: All new Bontrager AW3 Hard-Case Lite tires get more puncture proof, better traction
content:
Many riders go to great lengths to find the lightest and most efficient tire set up on the road. Others, just want to finish their ride without getting a flat. For that second group, there are tires like the Bontrager Hard-Case family. These reinforced tires blend advanced puncture protection with a high-performance road tire – […]

The post All new Bontrager AW3 Hard-Case Lite tires get more puncture proof, better traction appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
